page.title: 14 HOUSING
page.content: Most houses in the area are grey granite detatched farmhouses and croft houses with characteristic dormer windows.Some have been renovated the 8/10 years.In the village there are terraced,detatched and semi-detatched council houses. Property is expensive if you are a young first time buyer. There are 8 hospital houses standing empty.The council has been testing oppinion on renting these to mentally handicapped people.Two lots of modern bungalows have been built during the past 8 years.The newest property was built from a kit.We watched it arrive on 2 lorries after the foundations and cement block base had been laid.This year a new sheltered housing complex called the The Haven has been built. It has 12 flats each with a bedroom, kitchen,lounge,bathroom and a community room.There is a warden.
